purpose: Showcase Titanverse AI template generation feature through carousel format, demonstrating how AI builds consultation templates in seconds and enables consistent, effortless workflows.
core_message: AI generates templates in seconds from a simple prompt. Built once. Used everywhere. Fast. Consistent. Effortless.
summary: Carousel campaign showcasing Titanverse AI template generation feature, contrasting manual template building with AI-powered instant generation and team-wide reuse.
